text: Estivareilles is a French commune. It is in the Allier department in the center of France. It is about 10 km north of Montlu√ßon on the right-hand side of the Cher river. There is a lavoir (a public washing basin), a lantern of the dead and a church from the nineteenth century. ==Population== ==References== *INSEE ==Other websites== * The official web site of the mayor of Estivareilles * Estivareilles page at the National Geographical Institute Category:Communes in Allier
title: Estivareilles, Allier
